@notice Used for Flash Loan premium (fee) deposit
 @dev Must deposit first before calling initiateFlashLoan

@notice User funds will be less after FlashLoan is completed

attributes.text:
@notice Used for Flash Loan premium (fee) deposit
 @dev Must deposit first before calling initiateFlashLoan

@notice User funds will be less after FlashLoan is completed
 @dev User balance on contract (accounts[msg.sender]) is updated during the loan operation

devdoc.author: Marques Traylor
devdoc.details: User deposits fee, contract performs flash loan, left over balance automatically withdrawn from contract and sent back to user

params.from: User address that is depositing the premium

params.amount: Amount of reserve to request for the loan
params.balance: Updated user balance in contract after debt is paid back
params.from: User address that initiated the flash loan
params.reserve: Token address for the asset User wants to loan

params.amount: Amount of reserve to request for the loan
params.from: User address that initiated the flash loan
params.reserve: Token address for the asset User wants to loan

params.amount: Amount of reserve to request for the loan
params.from: User address that initiated the flash loan
params.reserve: Token address for the asset User wants to loan

params.amount: Amount currently owned by user in contract (can be less if they initiated a flash loan)
params.from: User address that is withdrawing deposited funds

returns._0: uint Current balance account has on contract

constructor.details: Pass the address as a parameter to deployer in migrations along with the contract

deposit().details: Must deposit first before calling initiateFlashLoan

initiateFlashLoan(address,uint256).details: Caller must deposit premium before requesting a FlashLoan

params.amount: Amount of tplem to request for the loan
params.token: Token address for the asset User wants to loan

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().details: User balance on contract (accounts[msg.sender]) is updated during the loan operation

devdoc.title: A contract for Aave FlashLoan interaction

Deposit(address,uint256).notice: Emits when a user deposits the premium associated with the FlashLoan

LoanCompleted(address,uint256,address,ui.notice: Emits after loan has been received and operation has been completed, the debt has been paid back, and user's account balance has been updatedWill not emit if the operation process fails

LoanExecuted(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Emits when lendingPool calls our executeOperation override and the loan was successfully receivedWill not emit if loan was not received

LoanInitiated(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Emits when initiateFlashLoan is called and flashLoan has been successfully called on lendingPoolWill not emit if required fee is not deposited first

Withdrawal(address,uint256).notice: Emits when user or contract withdraws deposited funds from contractWill not emit if withdraw fails (i.e. accounts[msg.sender] == 0)

balanceFor(address).notice: Query the current balance of an accountWill return 0 if account has not deposited yet

methods.constructor: Aave V1 contract addresses may be found here - https://docs.aave.com/developers/v/1.0/deployed-contracts/deployed-contract-instances

deposit().notice: Used for Flash Loan premium (fee) deposit

initiateFlashLoan(address,uint256).notice: Attempt to retrieve a flashloan for requested amountUses Aave V1 which only requires 1 asset address to be passed

withdraw().notice: User funds will be less after FlashLoan is completed
